info.name: Netflix Spoiler Remover
info.description:
This VERY SIMPLE style hides spoiler elements from the Netflix GUI.
Elements hidden :
 - background picture displayed during the loading of the video (major source of spoiling)
 - background picture displayed between episodes
 - rotating pictures taken from the movie/show while hovering titles
info.additionalInfo:
According to my tests after a few weeks, it doesn't break any Netflix features, all actions/buttons (video loading, clicks on movie/next episode, ...) are still working as intended, only spoiler pictures are hidden.

Obviously english isn't my native language, so if you have a better description, don't hesitate to send it to me. 
This is public licence so feel free to use this very short code to create/improve other userstyles/browser extensions.
